channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 00:12 Driven the threat of percussion BLAZPLACE, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district
item.description: 🟡 00:12 Driven the threat of percussion BLAZPLACE, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkivska_The community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
